mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_fmenu_base.select */ SELECT guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ ,fmenu_seq /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */ ,fmenu_nm /* fmenu_nm 식단표_명 character varying(100) */ ,mmel_yn /* mmel_yn 아침_여부 character(1) */ ,amel_yn /* amel_yn 점심_여부 character(1) */ ,emel_yn /* emel_yn 저녁_여부 character(1) */ ,smel_yn /* smel_yn 간식_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_fmenu_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ AND fmenu_seq = #{fmenuSeq} /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_fmenu_base.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_fmenu_base ( guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ ,fmenu_seq /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */
,fmenu_nm /* fmenu_nm 식단표_명 character varying(100) */
,mmel_yn /* mmel_yn 아침_여부 character(1) */ ,amel_yn /* amel_yn 점심_여부 character(1) */ ,emel_yn /* emel_yn 저녁_여부 character(1) */ ,smel_yn /* smel_yn 간식_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ #{fmenuSeq} /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */
,#{fmenuNm} /* fmenu_nm 식단표_명 character varying(100) */
,#{mmelYn} /* mmel_yn 아침_여부 character(1) */ ,#{amelYn} /* amel_yn 점심_여부 character(1) */ ,#{emelYn} /* emel_yn 저녁_여부 character(1) */ ,#{smelYn} /* smel_yn 간식_여부 character(1) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_fmenu_base.update */ UPDATE ts_fmenu_base
,fmenu_nm = #{fmenuNm} /* fmenu_nm 식단표_명 character varying(100) */
,mmel_yn = #{mmelYn} /* mmel_yn 아침_여부 character(1) */
,amel_yn = #{amelYn} /* amel_yn 점심_여부 character(1) */
,emel_yn = #{emelYn} /* emel_yn 저녁_여부 character(1) */
,smel_yn = #{smelYn} /* smel_yn 간식_여부 character(1) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ AND fmenu_seq = #{fmenuSeq} /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_fmenu_base.merge */ INSERT INTO ts_fmenu_base ( guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ fmenu_seq /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */
,fmenu_nm /* fmenu_nm 식단표_명 character varying(100) */
,mmel_yn /* mmel_yn 아침_여부 character(1) */ ,amel_yn /* amel_yn 점심_여부 character(1) */ ,emel_yn /* emel_yn 저녁_여부 character(1) */ ,smel_yn /* smel_yn 간식_여부 character(1) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ #{fmenuSeq} /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */
,#{fmenuNm} /* fmenu_nm 식단표_명 character varying(100) */
,#{mmelYn} /* mmel_yn 아침_여부 character(1) */ ,#{amelYn} /* amel_yn 점심_여부 character(1) */ ,#{emelYn} /* emel_yn 저녁_여부 character(1) */ ,#{smelYn} /* smel_yn 간식_여부 character(1) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
,fmenu_nm = #{fmenuNm} /* fmenu_nm 식단표_명 character varying(100) */
,mmel_yn = #{mmelYn} /* mmel_yn 아침_여부 character(1) */
,amel_yn = #{amelYn} /* amel_yn 점심_여부 character(1) */
,emel_yn = #{emelYn} /* emel_yn 저녁_여부 character(1) */
,smel_yn = #{smelYn} /* smel_yn 간식_여부 character(1) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_fmenu_base.delete */ DELETE FROM ts_fmenu_base WHERE 1 = 1 AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ AND fmenu_seq = #{fmenuSeq} /* fmenu_seq 식단표_순번 numeric */
